actions.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to concur in the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 2020) to authorize appropriations for the Office of Environmental Quality for fiscal years 1987, 1988 and 1989, with an amendment.

summary.text: Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 2020 (Office of Environmental Quality), with the Senate amendment thereto, and concurring in the Senate amendment with an amendment.

titles.title: A resolution to concur in the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 2020) to authorize appropriations for the Office of Environmental Quality for fiscal years 1987, 1988 and 1989, with an amendment.
